meanings.sent1: The potableness of the water was evident by its clear appearance.
meanings.sent2: I always check the potableness of the tap water before drinking it.
meanings.sent3: The party host joked about the potableness of the punch, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a potableness that quenched his thirst for knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The potableness of the tea was so refreshing on a hot day.
